meaning_str.bing:
prep. 遍及；各处；自始至终；贯穿整个时期
adv. 全部；自始至终；到处；彻头彻尾
网络. 吞吐率；纵观；始终

遍及；各处；自始至终；贯穿整个时期
全部；自始至终；到处；彻头彻尾

遍及；贯穿；在…各处；遍布；自始至终；在整个…期间；各处；贯穿整个时期
在所有方面；自始至终；彻底；从头到尾；始终；遍及全程

1.en: And she told Him she loved Him. Throughout her entire battle, she remained happy and trusting, telling everyone how good God was to her.
1.cn: 在最后的挣扎里，她一直乐观，并坚持的信仰，不断地告诉别人上帝待她如何好。

2.en: Lucas believes similar results over the next few games would prove once and for all that Liverpool have talent throughout the squad.
2.cn: 卢卡斯相信未来的几场比赛相同的结果还会再次验证利物浦中人才济济。

3.en: 'They have been involved throughout, so they cannot be independent, ' he said in an interview.
3.cn: 伍德福德在接受采访时说，他们自始至终都曾参与其中，因此也就不能说他们是独立的。

0.en: Yes, our culture worshiped the aggressor throughout the ages.
0.cn: 对，许多世代以来，我们文化中对侵略过度崇拜。

1.en: Ronan is destroying Xandarian outposts throughout the galaxy.
1.cn: 罗南摧毁银河各地的柴达基地。

2.en: Throughout the Commonwealth, there were equally joyful celebrations.
2.cn: 整个英联邦也充满了同等的喜悦。

3.en: Holy oil from the pontiff who wishes to spread Christianity throughout my lands.
3.cn: 圣油，罗马教皇希望以此将基督教义传播到我的国土。

4.en: In doing so, I have weakened your position before Karakorum and throughout China.
4.cn: 这样做，已经在哈拉和林和整个中原面前消弱了您的地位。

5.en: The Great Genghis, he of the wolf, dreamed of a Mongol empire stretching throughout all of China.
5.cn: 成吉思汗，狼之后裔，梦想蒙古帝国一统中原。

6.en: From our humble beginnings, and throughout the past 15 years, Alibaba has changed commerce in China.
6.cn: 从我们最初很单纯的一个小期望开始，如今十五年过去了，阿里巴巴已经改变了中国电子商务的模式。

7.en: Yet still the officials at court and the soldiers throughout the realm remain loyal to you, your majesty.
7.cn: 然侍卫之臣不懈于内，忠志之士忘身于外者，

8.en: Step 4: Buy new, red clothes to wear throughout the Chinese New Year celebration. The color is considered lucky.
8.cn: 第四步：买一些中国新年要穿来庆祝节日的红色新衣服，红色被认为是幸运的颜色。

9.en: Chinese New Year, also known as Lunar New Year, is celebrated throughout the world in late January or early February.
9.cn: 中国新年，又被称作农历新年，世界各地都在一月下旬或者二月上旬庆祝这个节日。

10.en: Step into the Main Concourse, and feel the echo of every tearful farewell and joyous greeting throughout the station's history.
10.cn: 车站建成以来，步入中央大堂都可以感受到每一个挥泪告别和快乐重逢的情景。

11.en: Yet even that pales into insignificance when compared to what the whole of the plant kingdom has done throughout the history of our planet.
11.cn: 但较之于地球发展史中，植物王国的辉煌贡献，这不过是沧海一粟。

12.en: Your union has been advised. ACARS data relayed that the left engine continued to turn throughout the flight. Then the ACARS data is wrong.
12.cn: 你们的工会已被告知，飞机通信寻址与报告系统的传输数据显示，左翼发动机在整个飞行期间一直在转动。那飞机通信寻址与报告系统的数据错了。

13.en: And I know a lot of people use bronzer after they've powdered, but I like to put on before because that really doesn't rub off throughout the day.
13.cn: 我知道很多人都是在涂粉之后才使用修容粉饼，但是我喜欢在之前使用，因为这样一整天都不会脱妆。

14.en: In perpetuity all throughout the universe and all alternate universes except for those universes where owning a couch is forbidden by the hive queen.
14.cn: 在所有宇宙中永远都是我的，平行宇宙中也是，除了那些虫族母皇下令禁止拥有沙发的宇宙里。

15.en: Don't be afraid to take sips throughout your speech. It will keep your voice natural and it gives you a moment to pause and regain your composure if needed.
15.cn: 不要担心在演讲中途喝水，这可以保持声音清澈，也可以给自己点时间休息，或是让自己放松。

16.en: And the problem is that despite their good intentions, they still end up procrastinating tremendously throughout the semester and paying a big price for that.
16.cn: 问题在于虽然学生们本意是想按时完成，但最后他们总是一拖再拖，直到学期结束并为此付出沉重代价。

17.en: In the beginning, you can only eat about two ounces at a time, so you'll need to eat six small meals throughout the day to get all the nutrients that you need.
17.cn: 刚开始，你每次只能吃约六十克的食物，所以你每天需要吃六顿小餐才能获取足够的营养。

18.en: We all know that we are better than the cynicism and the pessimism that is regurgitated throughout Washington, and the 24-hour cable news cycle, not my channel by the way.
18.cn: 我们知道，我们要好过华盛顿政府以及24小时循环播放的有线新闻中的犬儒主义与厌世主义，还好不是我的频道。

19.en: Throughout history, most currency, including the US dollar, was linked to valuable commodities and the amount of it in circulation depended on a government's gold or silver reserves.
19.cn: 历史上大多数的货币，包括美元都和有价商品连结，也和流通量相关，都依据政府的金银储备量而定。
